update run_data set sewageID = #{sewageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, testingtime = #{testingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, equipment1state = #{equipment1state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment2state = #{equipment2state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment3state = #{equipment3state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment4state = #{equipment4state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment5state = #{equipment5state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment6state = #{equipment6state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment7state = #{equipment7state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment8state = #{equipment8state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment9state = #{equipment9state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment10state = #{equipment10state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment11state = #{equipment11state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment12state = #{equipment12state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment13state = #{equipment13state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment14state = #{equipment14state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment15state = #{equipment15state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment16state = #{equipment16state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment17state = #{equipment17state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment18state = #{equipment18state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment19state = #{equipment19state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment20state = #{equipment20state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment21state = #{equipment21state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment22state = #{equipment22state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment23state = #{equipment23state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment24state = #{equipment24state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, equipment25state = #{equipment25state,jdbcType=TINYINT} where runID = #{runid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: select top 100 percent * from run_data where 1=1
mapper.select: select * from (select sewageid,max(testingtime) as testingtime from run_data group by sewageid) as temp left join run_data on run_data.testingtime = temp.testingtime and run_data.sewageid = temp.sewageid

select * from (select temp1.sewageID,temp1.testingtime,sewage.areaID from sewage , (select sewageid,max(testingtime) as testingtime from run_data group by sewageid ) as temp1 where sewage.sewageID = temp1.sewageID and areaid = #{id}) as tmp left join run_data on run_data.testingtime = tmp.testingtime and run_data.sewageid = tmp.sewageid
